document.full_text: indiana regulators fined notre dame $77,500 on tuesday for six safety violations in the october death of a 20-year-old student who was killed while filming football practice.
document.title: notre dame fined for safety violations
lines_and_colors: indiana regulators fined notre dame $77,500 on tuesday for six safety violations in the october death of a 20-year-old student who was killed while filming football practice.
